meanings.definition: A type of sedimentary rock that is composed mainly of microcrystalline quartz.
meanings.sent1: Novaculites can be found in certain areas where the rock formations are unique.
meanings.sent2: Geologists study novaculites to understand more about sedimentary rocks.
meanings.sent3: The novaculites in the quarry seemed to sparkle in the sunlight, making them stand out.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was as clear and sharp as novaculites, able to cut through any confusion.
meanings.sent5: The novaculites shimmered like tiny crystals, creating a beautiful display.

meanings.sent1: The novaculites were perfect for honing the edge of the knife.
meanings.sent2: Blacksmiths rely on novaculites to keep their tools sharp and precise.
meanings.sent3: The novaculites seemed to have a magical ability to make blades razor-sharp.
meanings.sent4: His wit was as keen as novaculites, cutting through the conversation effortlessly.
